AI & Computational Biology.title: Comprehensive echocardiogram evaluation with view primed vision language AI
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09850-xComprehensive echocardiogram evaluation with view primed vision language AI
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Echocardiography is the most widely used cardiac imaging modality, capturing ultrasound video data to assess cardiac structure and function1. Artificial intelligence (AI) in echocardiography has the potential to streamline manual tasks and improve reproducibility and precision2. However, most echocardiography AI models are single-view, single-task systems that do not synthesize complementary information from multiple views captured during a full exam3,4, and thus lead to limited performance and scope of applications. To address this problem, we introduce EchoPrime, a multi-view, view-informed, video-based vision-language foundation model trained on over 12 million video-report pairs. EchoPrime uses contrastive learning to train a unified embedding model for all standard views in a comprehensive echocardiogram study with representation of both rare and common diseases and diagnoses. EchoPrime then utilizes view-classification and a view-informed anatomic attention module to weight video-specific embeddings that accurately map the relationship between echocardiographic views and anatomical structures. With retrieval-augmented interpretation, EchoPrime integrates information from all echocardiogram videos in a comprehensive study and performs holistic clinical interpretation. In datasets from five international independent healthcare systems, EchoPrime achieves state-of-the art performance on 23 diverse benchmarks of cardiac form and function, surpassing the performance of both task-specific approaches and prior foundation models. Following rigorous clinical evaluation, EchoPrime can assist physicians in the automated preliminary assessment of comprehensive echocardiography.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 视图引导视觉语言人工智能在综合超声心动图评估中的应用
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 超声心动图是应用最广泛的心脏影像学检查方法，通过捕获超声视频数据来评估心脏结构和功能。人工智能（AI）在超声心动图领域的应用有望简化人工操作，提高检查的可重复性和精确性。然而，大多数超声心动图AI模型是单视图、单任务系统，无法综合利用完整检查过程中捕获的多个视图的互补信息，从而导致其性能和应用范围受限。为解决此问题，我们引入了EchoPrime，这是一个多视图、视图感知、基于视频的视觉语言基础模型，其在超过1200万个视频-报告对上进行了训练。EchoPrime利用对比学习，为综合超声心动图研究中的所有标准视图训练了一个统一的嵌入模型，该模型能够表示罕见和常见疾病及诊断。随后，EchoPrime利用视图分类和视图感知的解剖注意力模块，对视频特异性嵌入进行加权，从而精确映射超声心动图视图与解剖结构之间的关系。借助检索增强型解释，EchoPrime整合了综合研究中所有超声心动图视频的信息，并进行整体临床解释。在来自五个国际独立医疗系统的数据集中，EchoPrime在23个不同的心脏形态和功能基准测试中取得了最先进的性能，超越了任务特定方法和现有基础模型的表现。经过严格的临床评估，EchoPrime能够辅助医生对综合超声心动图进行自动化初步评估。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Multimodal learning enables chat-based exploration of single-cell data
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02857-9CellWhisperer uses multimodal learning of transcriptomes and text to answer questions about single-cell RNA-sequencing data.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Single-cell sequencing characterizes biological samples at unprecedented scale and detail, but data interpretation remains challenging. Here, we present CellWhisperer, an artificial intelligence (AI) model and software tool for chat-based interrogation of gene expression. We establish a multimodal embedding of transcriptomes and their textual annotations, using contrastive learning on 1 million RNA sequencing profiles with AI-curated descriptions. This embedding informs a large language model that answers user-provided questions about cells and genes in natural-language chats. We benchmark CellWhisperer’s performance for zero-shot prediction of cell types and other biological annotations and demonstrate its use for biological discovery in a meta-analysis of human embryonic development. We integrate a CellWhisperer chat box with the CELLxGENE browser, allowing users to interactively explore gene expression through a combined graphical and chat interface. In summary, CellWhisperer leverages large community-scale data repositories to connect transcriptomes and text, thereby enabling interactive exploration of single-cell RNA-sequencing data with natural-language chats. CellWhisperer uses multimodal learning of transcriptomes and text to answer questions about single-cell RNA-sequencing data.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 多模态学习赋能单细胞数据的对话式探索
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 单细胞测序以空前的规模和细节对生物样本进行表征，但数据解读仍具挑战。在此，我们提出CellWhisperer，这是一种人工智能（AI）模型和软件工具，旨在实现基因表达的对话式查询。我们通过对100万个RNA测序图谱及其AI策展的描述进行对比学习，建立了转录组及其文本注释的多模态嵌入。该嵌入为大型语言模型提供了基础，使其能够以自然语言对话的形式回答用户关于细胞和基因的问题。我们对CellWhisperer在细胞类型和其他生物学注释的零样本预测性能进行了基准评估，并在一项人类胚胎发育的荟萃分析中，展示了其在生物学发现中的应用。我们将CellWhisperer聊天框与CELLxGENE浏览器集成，使用户能够通过图形与对话相结合的界面交互式探索基因表达。总之，CellWhisperer利用大型社区规模的数据存储库连接转录组数据与文本信息，从而通过自然语言对话实现单细胞RNA测序数据的交互式探索。CellWhisperer通过转录组和文本的多模态学习，解答关于单细胞RNA测序数据的问题。

AI & Computational Biology.title: A software platform for real-time and adaptive neuroscience experiments
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64856-3An optimal model-experiment integration for testing many complex hypotheses is still lacking. Here authors introduce improv, a modular software platform enabling real-time adaptive neuroscience experiments, orchestrating parallel data collection, modeling, and experimental control. Authors demonstrate various use cases, including online neural analysis and closed-loop optogenetics in zebrafish.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Current neuroscience research is often limited to testing predetermined hypotheses and post hoc analysis of already collected data. Adaptive experimental designs, in which modeling drives ongoing data collection and selects experimental manipulations, offer a promising alternative. However, such adaptive paradigms require tight integration between software and hardware under real-time constraints. We introduce improv, a software platform for flexible integration of modeling, data collection, analysis pipelines, and live experimental control. We demonstrate both in silico and in vivo how improv enables efficient experimental designs for discovery and validation across various model organisms and data types. We used improv to orchestrate real-time behavioral analyses, rapid functional typing of neural responses via calcium imaging, optimal visual stimulus selection, and model-driven optogenetic photostimulation of visually responsive neurons in the zebrafish brain. Together, these results demonstrate the power of improv to integrate modeling with data collection and experimental control to achieve next-generation adaptive experiments. An optimal model-experiment integration for testing many complex hypotheses is still lacking. Here authors introduce improv, a modular software platform enabling real-time adaptive neuroscience experiments, orchestrating parallel data collection, modeling, and experimental control. Authors demonstrate various use cases, including online neural analysis and closed-loop optogenetics in zebrafish.
AI & Computational Biology.authors_short: Draelos, Anne et al., Naumann, Eva A.
AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 一个用于实时和自适应神经科学实验的软件平台
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 当前的神经科学研究常受限于检验预设假设以及对已收集数据的回顾性分析。自适应实验设计，即通过模型驱动持续数据收集并选择实验操作，提供了一种有前景的替代方案。然而，此类自适应范式要求在实时约束下实现软件与硬件的紧密集成。我们引入了improv，一个能够灵活集成建模、数据收集、分析流程和实时实验控制的软件平台。我们通过计算机模拟（in silico）和体内（in vivo）实验证明了improv如何为各种模式生物和数据类型实现高效的实验设计，以促进科学发现和验证。我们利用improv协调了实时行为分析、通过钙成像对神经反应进行快速功能分型、优化视觉刺激选择，以及在斑马鱼大脑中对视觉响应神经元进行模型驱动的光遗传学光刺激。综上所述，这些结果展示了improv在整合建模与数据收集和实验控制方面的强大能力，从而实现下一代自适应实验。目前，针对许多复杂假设进行测试的最佳模型-实验集成仍有待完善。本文作者在此介绍了improv，一个模块化的软件平台，它能够实现实时自适应神经科学实验，并协调并行的数据收集、建模和实验控制。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Universal consensus 3D segmentation of cells from 2D segmented stacks
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02887-wu-Segment3D is a universal framework that translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data. It performs well across diverse datasets, including cells with complex morphologies.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Cell segmentation is the foundation of a wide range of microscopy-based biological studies. Deep learning has revolutionized two-dimensional (2D) cell segmentation, enabling generalized solutions across cell types and imaging modalities. This has been driven by the ease of scaling up image acquisition, annotation and computation. However, three-dimensional (3D) cell segmentation, requiring dense annotation of 2D slices, still poses substantial challenges. Manual labeling of 3D cells to train broadly applicable segmentation models is prohibitive. Even in high-contrast images annotation is ambiguous and time-consuming. Here we develop a theory and toolbox, u-Segment3D, for 2D-to-3D segmentation, compatible with any 2D method generating pixel-based instance cell masks. u-Segment3D translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data, as demonstrated on 11 real-life datasets, comprising >70,000 cells, spanning single cells, cell aggregates and tissue. Moreover, u-Segment3D is competitive with native 3D segmentation, even exceeding when cells are crowded and have complex morphologies. u-Segment3D is a universal framework that translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data. It performs well across diverse datasets, including cells with complex morphologies.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 基于二维分割堆栈的细胞普适共识三维分割
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 细胞分割是广泛显微镜生物学研究的基础。深度学习彻底改变了二维（2D）细胞分割，实现了跨细胞类型和成像模式的通用解决方案。这得益于图像采集、标注和计算的易于扩展性。然而，三维（3D）细胞分割需要对2D切片进行密集标注，这仍然带来了巨大的挑战。手动标注3D细胞以训练广泛适用的分割模型成本过高且不可行。即使在高对比度图像中，标注也存在模糊性且耗时。在此，我们开发了一种理论和工具箱u-Segment3D，用于2D到3D的细胞分割，它兼容任何生成基于像素的实例细胞掩膜的2D方法。u-Segment3D无需训练数据即可将2D实例分割转换为并增强为3D共识实例分割，这已在11个真实数据集上得到验证，这些数据集包含超过70,000个细胞，涵盖单细胞、细胞聚集体和组织。此外，u-Segment3D与原生3D分割方法相比具有竞争力，甚至在细胞拥挤且形态复杂时表现更优。u-Segment3D是一个通用框架，无需训练数据即可将2D实例分割转换为并增强为3D共识实例分割。它在各种数据集上表现良好，包括具有复杂形态的细胞。

AI & Computational Biology.title: AlphaSync is an enhanced AlphaFold structure database synchronized with UniProt
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01719-xAlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Accurate prediction of protein structures is essential for understanding biological functions and guiding biomedical research. However, maintaining synchronization between structure models and rapidly expanding, continuously evolving protein sequence databases remains a major challenge. Here, we present AlphaSync ( alphasync.stjude.org ), a comprehensive resource that complements the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database. AlphaSync currently provides 2.6 million UniProt-synchronized structural models, including predictions for 40,016 updated proteins and isoforms from 925 species. AlphaSync achieves complete, up-to-date proteome coverage for 42 species, including humans, key pathogens and model organisms. It also provides residue-level annotations such as solvent accessibility, dihedral angles, intrinsic disorder status and over 4.7 billion atom-level noncovalent contacts. Its up-to-date structural models and detailed annotations will facilitate the study of protein structure–function relationships, assessment of sequence variants and machine learning tasks including protein design. With an intuitive web interface and application programming interface, AlphaSync enables protein research at scale and in detail. AlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: AlphaSync：一个与UniProt同步的增强型AlphaFold结构数据库
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 蛋白质结构的准确预测对于理解生物功能和指导生物医学研究至关重要。然而，在结构模型与快速扩展、持续演进的蛋白质序列数据库之间保持同步仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们介绍了AlphaSync (alphasync.stjude.org)，这是一个补充AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的综合性资源。AlphaSync目前提供了260万个与UniProt同步的结构模型，其中包括来自925个物种的40,016个更新蛋白质及其异构体的预测。AlphaSync实现了对42个物种（包括人类、关键病原体和模式生物）的完整、最新的蛋白质组覆盖。它还提供了残基水平的注释，例如溶剂可及性、二面角、内在无序状态以及超过47亿个原子水平的非共价接触。其最新的结构模型和详细注释将促进蛋白质结构-功能关系的研究、序列变异的评估以及包括蛋白质设计在内的机器学习任务。凭借直观的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，AlphaSync能够大规模、详细地开展蛋白质研究。AlphaSync通过可访问的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，将AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的预测与UniProt序列同步，为人类、模式生物和病原体提供带有残基水平注释的最新蛋白质结构。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Digital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
AI & Computational Biology.summary: npj Systems Biology and Applications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41540-025-00596-wDigital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: The development of effective interventions for neurodegenerative disorders, such as posterior cortical atrophy (a visual Alzheimer’s variant), remains to be a significant clinical challenge. We introduce a computational framework using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) as in silico models to simulate visual system degeneration and evaluate intervention strategies. By modeling controlled synaptic decay and comparing three distinct retraining approaches, random data (control), accuracy-based, and entropy-based, we assess impacts on classification performance and neural representation geometry. Our results demonstrate that accuracy-based retraining outperformed other strategies, maintaining model performance and preserving optimal manifold geometry during intermediate degeneration stages. This computational analysis supports prioritizing accuracy-targeted interventions for cognitive compensation. Our framework enables rapid evaluation of intervention efficacy while elucidating computational principles underlying neurodegeneration and recovery. This approach offers a platform for refining strategies to slow visual-cognitive decline in neurodegenerative diseases, bridging mechanistic insights with clinical translation.
AI & Computational Biology.authors_short: Moore, Jasmine A. et al., Forkert, Nils D.
AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 数字痴呆与退化神经网络认知干预的评估
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 神经退行性疾病（如后皮层萎缩，一种视觉型阿尔茨海默病变体）有效干预措施的开发，仍然是一个重大的临床挑战。我们引入了一个计算框架，该框架利用卷积神经网络（CNNs）作为计算机模拟模型，以模拟视觉系统退化并评估干预策略。通过模拟受控的突触衰减，并比较三种不同的再训练方法——随机数据（对照）、基于准确性的方法和基于熵的方法，我们评估了它们对分类性能和神经表征几何结构的影响。我们的结果表明，在中间退化阶段，基于准确性的再训练优于其他策略，能够保持模型性能并保留最佳流形几何结构。这项计算分析支持优先采用以准确性为目标的干预措施，以实现认知补偿。我们的框架能够快速评估干预措施的有效性，同时阐明神经退行性变和恢复背后的计算原理。这种方法为完善减缓神经退行性疾病中视觉认知衰退的策略提供了一个平台，将机制洞察与临床转化相结合。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Heterogeneous plasticity of amygdala interneurons in associative learning and extinction
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-66122-yIn this study, the authors uncover how diverse inhibitory interneurons in the amygdala flexibly contribute to fear and safety learning, revealing a key role for inhibition in emotional memory and adaptive circuit plasticity.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Neural circuits undergo experience-dependent plasticity to form long-lasting memories, but how inhibitory interneurons contribute to this process remains poorly understood. Using miniature microscope calcium imaging, we monitored the activity of large amygdala interneuron populations in freely moving mice during fear learning and extinction. Here we show that interneurons exhibit complex and heterogeneous plasticity at both single-cell and ensemble levels across memory acquisition, expression, and extinction. Analysis of molecular interneuron subpopulations revealed that disinhibitory vasoactive intestinal peptide (VIP)-expressing cells are predominantly activated by salient external stimuli, whereas the activity of projection neuron targeting somatostatin (SST) interneurons additionally aligns with internal behavioural states. Although responses within each interneuron subtype are non-uniform, molecular identity biases their functional role, producing weighted circuit outputs that can flexibly regulate excitatory projection neuron activity and plasticity. These findings demonstrate that inhibitory interneurons actively shape the encoding and stability of emotional memories, underscoring their importance in adaptive learning. In this study, the authors uncover how diverse inhibitory interneurons in the amygdala flexibly contribute to fear and safety learning, revealing a key role for inhibition in emotional memory and adaptive circuit plasticity.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 杏仁核中间神经元在联想学习和消退中的异质性可塑性
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 神经回路经历经验依赖性可塑性以形成持久记忆，但抑制性中间神经元如何参与这一过程仍知之甚少。本研究利用微型显微镜钙成像技术，在自由活动小鼠的恐惧学习和消退过程中，监测了大量杏仁核中间神经元群体的活动。我们发现，中间神经元在记忆的获取、表达和消退过程中，在单细胞和群体层面均表现出复杂且异质性的可塑性。对分子中间神经元亚群的分析揭示，去抑制性血管活性肠肽（VIP）表达细胞主要被显著的外部刺激激活，而靶向投射神经元的生长抑素（SST）中间神经元的活动则额外与内部行为状态相关联。尽管每个中间神经元亚型内部的反应并非均一，但分子特性偏向了它们的功能角色，产生了能够灵活调节兴奋性投射神经元活动和可塑性的加权回路输出。这些发现表明，抑制性中间神经元积极塑造情绪记忆的编码和稳定性，强调了它们在适应性学习中的重要性。本研究揭示了杏仁核中多样化的抑制性中间神经元如何灵活地促进恐惧和安全学习，从而揭示了抑制作用在情绪记忆和适应性回路可塑性中的关键作用。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Single-cell analysis reveals cell death as driver of NLRP3-mediated secretion of IL-1β in human monocytes
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Immunology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41590-025-02319-zLamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Interleukin-1β (IL-1β) is a key proinflammatory cytokine with critical roles in infections and inflammatory diseases, yet the mechanisms regulating its release from human monocytes remain unclear. Here we used a suite of single-cell approaches, including integrated live-cell imaging of secretion and cell fate, flow cytometry and high-content imaging, to investigate IL-1β secretion dynamics in lipopolysaccharide-stimulated primary human peripheral blood CD14+ monocytes. We found marked heterogeneity: a large fraction of cells remained viable and contributed negligibly to IL-1β secretion, challenging established models. Instead, a small subset (5–10%) undergoing canonical NLRP3 inflammasome activation and GSDMD-dependent pyroptosis produced the majority of secreted IL-1β, with a smaller contribution from apoptotic cells transitioning to secondary necrosis. Single-cell profiling of CD14+ monocytes from patients with cryopyrin-associated periodic syndrome confirmed lytic cell death as the driver of pathological IL-1β release. These findings redefine IL-1β as a damage-associated molecular pattern, secreted predominantly by dying monocytes. Lamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.

Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 白细胞介素-1β (IL-1β) 是一种关键的促炎细胞因子，在感染和炎症性疾病中发挥着重要作用，然而，其从人单核细胞中释放的调控机制仍不清楚。本研究中，我们采用了一系列单细胞方法，包括分泌和细胞命运的整合活细胞成像、流式细胞术和高内涵成像，以研究脂多糖刺激的原代人外周血CD14+单核细胞中IL-1β的分泌动态。我们发现显著的异质性：大部分细胞保持活力，对IL-1β分泌的贡献微乎其微，这挑战了既有的模型。相反，一小部分（5-10%）经历经典NLRP3炎性体激活和GSDMD依赖性细胞焦亡的细胞产生了大部分分泌的IL-1β，而从凋亡细胞向继发性坏死转变的细胞贡献较小。对冷吡啉相关周期综合征患者CD14+单核细胞的单细胞分析证实，裂解性细胞死亡是病理性IL-1β释放的驱动因素。这些发现将IL-1β重新定义为一种损伤相关分子模式，主要由垂死的单核细胞分泌。Lamkanfi、Shirasaki、Izawa及其同事的研究表明，在脂多糖刺激或携带NLRP3激活突变的人单核细胞中，IL-1β的释放主要局限于经历裂解性细胞死亡的细胞。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Digital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
Clinical & Medicine.summary: npj Systems Biology and Applications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41540-025-00596-wDigital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: The development of effective interventions for neurodegenerative disorders, such as posterior cortical atrophy (a visual Alzheimer’s variant), remains to be a significant clinical challenge. We introduce a computational framework using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) as in silico models to simulate visual system degeneration and evaluate intervention strategies. By modeling controlled synaptic decay and comparing three distinct retraining approaches, random data (control), accuracy-based, and entropy-based, we assess impacts on classification performance and neural representation geometry. Our results demonstrate that accuracy-based retraining outperformed other strategies, maintaining model performance and preserving optimal manifold geometry during intermediate degeneration stages. This computational analysis supports prioritizing accuracy-targeted interventions for cognitive compensation. Our framework enables rapid evaluation of intervention efficacy while elucidating computational principles underlying neurodegeneration and recovery. This approach offers a platform for refining strategies to slow visual-cognitive decline in neurodegenerative diseases, bridging mechanistic insights with clinical translation.

Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 神经退行性疾病（如后皮层萎缩，一种视觉型阿尔茨海默病变体）有效干预措施的开发，仍然是一个重大的临床挑战。我们引入了一个计算框架，该框架利用卷积神经网络（CNNs）作为计算机模拟模型，以模拟视觉系统退化并评估干预策略。通过模拟受控的突触衰减，并比较三种不同的再训练方法——随机数据（对照）、基于准确性的方法和基于熵的方法，我们评估了它们对分类性能和神经表征几何结构的影响。我们的结果表明，在中间退化阶段，基于准确性的再训练优于其他策略，能够保持模型性能并保留最佳流形几何结构。这项计算分析支持优先采用以准确性为目标的干预措施，以实现认知补偿。我们的框架能够快速评估干预措施的有效性，同时阐明神经退行性变和恢复背后的计算原理。这种方法为完善减缓神经退行性疾病中视觉认知衰退的策略提供了一个平台，将机制洞察与临床转化相结合。

Structure.title: High performance tandem perovskite LEDs through interlayer photon recycling
Structure.summary: Nature, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09865-4High performance tandem perovskite LEDs through interlayer photon recycling
Structure.abstract: Tandem light-emitting diodes (LEDs), achieved by vertically stacking multiple units in series to combine the luminance of individual light-emitting elements, are effective for improving efficiency and lifespan compared to single-unit devices1–3. In particular, tandem perovskite LEDs benefit from the small Stokes shifts of perovskites4, which in principle can enable significant photon recycling between individual perovskite layers and enhance light extraction from trapped modes. However, a tandem structure that effectively merges the luminance of each perovskite units still remains a significant challenge. Here, we demonstrate efficient and stable tandem LEDs by combining two solution-processed perovskite light-emitting units. This tandem structure effectively combines the original luminance of each light-emitting units; we argue that the emissions are also significantly enhanced through photon recycling between the individual light-emitting units. Consequently, we achieve tandem perovskite LEDs with a low turn-on voltage of 3.2 V, a high peak external quantum efficiency (EQE) of 45.5% (even 20% higher than the sum of peak EQEs of single-unit devices), an average peak EQE of 40.9%, and a half-lifetime of 64 h at an initial radiance of 70 W Sr−1 m−2. These findings represent a significant advancement in achieving high-performance and multicolor LEDs through the stacking of perovskite LEDs.

Structure.title_cn: 通过层间光子再循环实现高性能叠层钙钛矿发光二极管
Structure.abstract_cn: 叠层发光二极管（LED）通过将多个发光单元垂直串联堆叠，以结合单个发光元件的亮度，与单单元器件相比，能有效提高效率和寿命1-3。特别是，叠层钙钛矿LED受益于钙钛矿材料小的斯托克斯位移4，这原则上可以实现单个钙钛矿层之间显著的光子再循环，并增强对陷阱模式光的提取。然而，如何构建一种能有效融合各个钙钛矿单元亮度的叠层结构，仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们通过结合两个溶液处理的钙钛矿发光单元，展示了高效稳定的叠层LED。这种叠层结构有效结合了每个发光单元的原始亮度；我们认为，通过单个发光单元之间的光子再循环，发光强度也得到了显著增强。因此，我们实现了具有低启亮电压3.2 V、高峰值外量子效率（EQE）45.5%（甚至比单单元器件的峰值EQE总和高出20%）、平均峰值EQE 40.9%，以及在初始辐射亮度为70 W Sr−1 m−2下半衰期达64小时的叠层钙钛矿LED。这些发现代表了通过钙钛矿LED堆叠实现高性能和多色LED的重大进展。

Structure.title: Ca<sup>2+</sup>-driven PDIA6 biomolecular condensation ensures proinsulin folding
Structure.summary: Nature Cell Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41556-025-01794-8Lee et al. show that Ca²⁺ triggers condensates enriched with PDIA6, an ER-resident disulfide isomerase and chaperone, along with other protein disulfide isomerase family proteins and some chaperones that in turn enhance folding of proinsulin.
Structure.abstract: The endoplasmic reticulum (ER) plays crucial roles in maintaining protein quality control and regulating dynamic Ca2+ storage in eukaryotic cells. However, the proteostasis system involved in ER-mediated protein quality control has not been fully characterized. Here we show that Ca2+ triggers the condensation of PDIA6, an ER-resident disulfide isomerase and molecular chaperone, into quality control granules. In contrast to the condensation mechanism observed for proteins containing low-complexity domains, our results indicate that transient but specific electrostatic interactions occur between the first and the third folded thioredoxin-like domains of PDIA6. We further show that the PDIA6 condensates recruit proinsulin, thereby accelerating the oxidative proinsulin folding and suppressing the proinsulin aggregation inside quality control granules, essential for secretion of insulin. Lee et al. show that Ca²⁺ triggers condensates enriched with PDIA6, an ER-resident disulfide isomerase and chaperone, along with other protein disulfide isomerase family proteins and some chaperones that in turn enhance folding of proinsulin.

Structure.abstract_cn: 内质网 (ER) 在真核细胞中维持蛋白质质量控制和调节动态钙离子储存方面发挥着关键作用。然而，内质网介导的蛋白质质量控制所涉及的蛋白质稳态系统尚未被充分阐明。本研究表明，钙离子触发了内质网驻留的二硫键异构酶和分子伴侣PDIA6凝集形成质量控制颗粒。与含有低复杂性结构域的蛋白质所观察到的凝集机制不同，我们的结果表明，PDIA6的第一个和第三个折叠的硫氧还蛋白样结构域之间发生了瞬态但特异性的静电相互作用。我们进一步发现，PDIA6凝集体招募胰岛素原，从而加速胰岛素原的氧化折叠并抑制其在质量控制颗粒内的聚集，这对于胰岛素的分泌至关重要。Lee等人研究表明，钙离子触发了富含PDIA6（一种内质网驻留的二硫键异构酶和伴侣蛋白）以及其他蛋白质二硫键异构酶家族蛋白和一些伴侣蛋白的凝集体形成，这些凝集体进而促进了胰岛素原的折叠。

Structure.title: AlphaSync is an enhanced AlphaFold structure database synchronized with UniProt
Structure.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01719-xAlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.
Structure.abstract: Accurate prediction of protein structures is essential for understanding biological functions and guiding biomedical research. However, maintaining synchronization between structure models and rapidly expanding, continuously evolving protein sequence databases remains a major challenge. Here, we present AlphaSync ( alphasync.stjude.org ), a comprehensive resource that complements the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database. AlphaSync currently provides 2.6 million UniProt-synchronized structural models, including predictions for 40,016 updated proteins and isoforms from 925 species. AlphaSync achieves complete, up-to-date proteome coverage for 42 species, including humans, key pathogens and model organisms. It also provides residue-level annotations such as solvent accessibility, dihedral angles, intrinsic disorder status and over 4.7 billion atom-level noncovalent contacts. Its up-to-date structural models and detailed annotations will facilitate the study of protein structure–function relationships, assessment of sequence variants and machine learning tasks including protein design. With an intuitive web interface and application programming interface, AlphaSync enables protein research at scale and in detail. AlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.

Structure.title_cn: AlphaSync：一个与UniProt同步的增强型AlphaFold结构数据库
Structure.abstract_cn: 蛋白质结构的准确预测对于理解生物功能和指导生物医学研究至关重要。然而，在结构模型与快速扩展、持续演进的蛋白质序列数据库之间保持同步仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们介绍了AlphaSync (alphasync.stjude.org)，这是一个补充AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的综合性资源。AlphaSync目前提供了260万个与UniProt同步的结构模型，其中包括来自925个物种的40,016个更新蛋白质及其异构体的预测。AlphaSync实现了对42个物种（包括人类、关键病原体和模式生物）的完整、最新的蛋白质组覆盖。它还提供了残基水平的注释，例如溶剂可及性、二面角、内在无序状态以及超过47亿个原子水平的非共价接触。其最新的结构模型和详细注释将促进蛋白质结构-功能关系的研究、序列变异的评估以及包括蛋白质设计在内的机器学习任务。凭借直观的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，AlphaSync能够大规模、详细地开展蛋白质研究。AlphaSync通过可访问的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，将AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的预测与UniProt序列同步，为人类、模式生物和病原体提供带有残基水平注释的最新蛋白质结构。

Molecular Design.title: CO<sub>2</sub>-triggered reversible transformation of soft elastomers into rigid and highly fluorescent plastics
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65495-4Carbon dioxide responsive polymers are promising for smart technologies, though it is challenging to effectively regulate these properties reliably. Here the authors report an elastomer composed of polyethyleneimine and polydimethylsiloxane which can reversibly its Young’s modulus responding to carbon dioxide.
Molecular Design.abstract: Polymers that alter their properties and functions in response to carbon dioxide (CO2) exposure offer significant potential for the development of smart technologies and innovative CO2 utilization approaches. Nonetheless, effectively regulating the behavior of solid-state polymers using CO2 remains a considerable challenge, highlighting the need for robust and reliable strategies to address this issue. This study presents elastomers that feature nanophase-separated morphologies composed of CO2-vitrifiable polyethyleneimine and CO2-permeable polydimethylsiloxane components. The elastomers (Young’s modulus (E) of approximately 1 MPa) reversibly transform into hard plastics (E > 2 GPa) in the presence of CO2. In addition to bulk stiffening, their surface adhesion and friction rapidly shift, and the material’s fluorescence is significantly amplified. Here, we show that these multifunctional responses to CO2 position the materials as innovative platforms for responsive mechanical systems and CO2-activated optical devices, with potential applications in sensing, display, and data storage technologies. Carbon dioxide responsive polymers are promising for smart technologies, though it is challenging to effectively regulate these properties reliably. Here the authors report an elastomer composed of polyethyleneimine and polydimethylsiloxane which can reversibly its Young’s modulus responding to carbon dioxide.

Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 聚合物在暴露于二氧化碳(CO₂)时改变其性质和功能，为智能技术和创新的CO₂利用方法的发展提供了巨大潜力。然而，利用CO₂有效调控固态聚合物的行为仍然是一个巨大的挑战，这凸显了开发稳健可靠策略来解决这一问题的必要性。本研究提出了一种弹性体，其具有纳米相分离形态，由CO₂可玻璃化的聚乙烯亚胺和CO₂可渗透的聚二甲基硅氧烷组分构成。在CO₂存在下，这些弹性体（杨氏模量(E)约为1 MPa）可逆地转化为硬质塑料（E > 2 GPa）。除了整体硬化，它们的表面粘附性和摩擦力也迅速改变，并且材料的荧光显著增强。在此，我们展示了这些对CO₂的多功能响应使该材料成为响应式机械系统和CO₂激活光学器件的创新平台，在传感、显示和数据存储技术中具有潜在应用。二氧化碳响应性聚合物在智能技术中前景广阔，尽管有效且可靠地调控这些性能仍具挑战。本文作者报道了一种由聚乙烯亚胺和聚二甲基硅氧烷组成的弹性体，其杨氏模量可响应二氧化碳而发生可逆变化。

Molecular Design.title: AlphaSync is an enhanced AlphaFold structure database synchronized with UniProt
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01719-xAlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.
Molecular Design.abstract: Accurate prediction of protein structures is essential for understanding biological functions and guiding biomedical research. However, maintaining synchronization between structure models and rapidly expanding, continuously evolving protein sequence databases remains a major challenge. Here, we present AlphaSync ( alphasync.stjude.org ), a comprehensive resource that complements the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database. AlphaSync currently provides 2.6 million UniProt-synchronized structural models, including predictions for 40,016 updated proteins and isoforms from 925 species. AlphaSync achieves complete, up-to-date proteome coverage for 42 species, including humans, key pathogens and model organisms. It also provides residue-level annotations such as solvent accessibility, dihedral angles, intrinsic disorder status and over 4.7 billion atom-level noncovalent contacts. Its up-to-date structural models and detailed annotations will facilitate the study of protein structure–function relationships, assessment of sequence variants and machine learning tasks including protein design. With an intuitive web interface and application programming interface, AlphaSync enables protein research at scale and in detail. AlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Stable clonal contribution of lineage-restricted stem cells to human hematopoiesis
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02405-wThis study uses somatic mutations as a natural barcoding system to retrospectively and prospectively trace the fate of hematopoietic stem cells across all major blood cell lineages in healthy aged individuals. It reveals the existence of intrinsically fate-biased hematopoietic stem cells in native human hematopoiesis, validated by transplantation assays.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Dynamic steady-state lineage contribution of human hematopoietic stem cell (HSC) clones needs to be assessed over time. However, clonal contribution of HSCs has only been investigated at single time points and without assessing the critical erythroid and platelet lineages. Here we screened for somatic mutations in healthy aged individuals, identifying expanded HSC clones accessible for lineage tracing of all major blood cell lineages. In addition to HSC clones with balanced contribution to all lineages, we identified clones with all myeloid lineages but no or few B and T lymphocytes or all myeloid lineages and B cells but no T cells. No other lineage restriction patterns were reproducibly observed. Retrospective phylogenetic inferences uncovered a ‘hierarchical’ pattern of descendant subclones more lineage biased than their ancestral clone and a more common ‘stable’ pattern with descendant subclones showing highly concordant lineage contributions with their ancestral clone, despite decades of separation. Prospective lineage tracing confirmed remarkable stability over years of HSC clones with distinct lineage replenishment patterns. This study uses somatic mutations as a natural barcoding system to retrospectively and prospectively trace the fate of hematopoietic stem cells across all major blood cell lineages in healthy aged individuals. It reveals the existence of intrinsically fate-biased hematopoietic stem cells in native human hematopoiesis, validated by transplantation assays.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 谱系受限干细胞对人类造血的稳定克隆贡献
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 人类造血干细胞（HSC）克隆的动态稳态谱系贡献需要随时间进行评估。然而，HSC的克隆贡献此前仅在单一时间点进行过研究，并且未能评估关键的红系和血小板谱系。本研究筛查了健康老年个体中的体细胞突变，从而识别出可用于追踪所有主要血细胞谱系的扩增HSC克隆。除了对所有谱系均有平衡贡献的HSC克隆外，我们还发现了一些克隆，它们对所有髓系谱系均有贡献，但B和T淋巴细胞缺失或极少，或者对所有髓系谱系和B细胞有贡献但T细胞缺失。未观察到其他可重复的谱系限制模式。回顾性系统发育推断揭示了两种模式：一种是“分层”模式，其中子代亚克隆比其祖代克隆表现出更强的谱系偏向性；另一种更常见的“稳定”模式，其中子代亚克隆尽管经过数十年的分离，但与祖代克隆表现出高度一致的谱系贡献。前瞻性谱系追踪证实了具有不同谱系补充模式的HSC克隆在多年内的显著稳定性。本研究利用体细胞突变作为一种天然条形码系统，回顾性地和前瞻性地追踪了健康老年个体中造血干细胞在所有主要血细胞谱系中的命运。它揭示了在天然人类造血过程中存在内在命运偏向的造血干细胞，并通过移植实验得到了验证。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Dynamic dosage changes in X-linked transposable elements during mammalian dosage compensation
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64865-2X-chromosome dosage compensation involves inactivation and hyperactivation, but the role of transposable elements is unclear. Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: In mammals, X-linked dosage compensation involves X-chromosome inactivation to balance X chromosome dosage between males and females, and hyperactivation of the remaining X-chromosome (Xa-hyperactivation) to achieve X-autosome balance in both sexes. Studies of both processes have largely focused on coding genes and have not accounted for transposable elements which comprise 50% of the X-chromosome with numerous epigenetic functions. Here we develop a new bioinformatic pipeline tailored to repetitive elements with capability for allelic discrimination. We then apply the pipeline to our recent So-Smart-Seq analysis of single embryos to comprehensively interrogate whether X-linked transposable elements are subject to either X-chromosome inactivation or Xa-hyperactivation. We observe significant differences in repeat silencing in parentally driven “imprinted” versus zygotically driven “random” X-chromosome inactivation. Chromosomal positioning, genetic background and evolutionary age impact their silencing. In contrast, transposable elements do not undergo Xa-hyperactivation. Evolutionary and functional implications are discussed. X-chromosome dosage compensation involves inactivation and hyperactivation, but the role of transposable elements is unclear. Here, the authors show that X-linked repeats are differentially silenced during inactivation but do not undergo hyperactivation.

Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 哺乳动物剂量补偿过程中X连锁转座元件的动态剂量变化
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 在哺乳动物中，X连锁剂量补偿涉及X染色体失活以平衡雄性和雌性之间的X染色体剂量，以及剩余X染色体的超激活（Xa超激活）以在两性中实现X-常染色体平衡。对这两个过程的研究主要集中在编码基因上，而忽略了转座元件，后者占X染色体的50%并具有多种表观遗传功能。在此，我们开发了一种针对重复元件的新型生物信息学流程，该流程具有等位基因区分能力。随后，我们将该流程应用于我们最近对单个胚胎进行的So-Smart-Seq分析，以全面探究X连锁转座元件是否受到X染色体失活或Xa超激活的影响。我们观察到，在亲本驱动的“印记”X染色体失活与合子驱动的“随机”X染色体失活中，重复序列的沉默存在显著差异。染色体定位、遗传背景和进化年龄影响其沉默。相比之下，转座元件不经历Xa超激活。本文讨论了其进化和功能意义。X染色体剂量补偿涉及失活和超激活，但转座元件的作用尚不明确。本文作者表明，X连锁重复序列在失活过程中表现出差异性沉默，但不经历超激活。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Evolutionary characterization of antiviral SAMD9/9L across kingdoms supports ancient convergence and lineage-specific adaptations
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Ecology & Evolution, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41559-025-02845-xA search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Human SAMD9 and SAMD9L are duplicated genes that encode innate immune proteins restricting poxviruses and lentiviruses, such as human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). Mutations in these genes are implicated in genetic diseases and cancer. Here we combined structural similarity searches, phylogenetics and population genomics with experimental assays of SAMD9/9L functions to resolve the evolutionary and functional dynamics of these immune proteins, spanning from prokaryotes to primates. We discovered structural analogues of SAMD9/9L in the antibacteriophage defence system, Avs, resulting from convergent evolution. Further, the predicted nuclease site was conserved in bacterial analogues and was essential for cell death, suggesting a fundamental role in defence across different life kingdoms. Despite this shared immunity, we identified genomic signatures of evolutionary arms races in mammals, with remarkable gene copy number variations. We further unveiled that the absence of SAMD9 in bonobos corresponds to a recent gene loss still segregating in the population. Finally, we found that chimpanzee and bonobo SAMD9Ls have enhanced anti-HIV-1 functions compared with the human orthologue. These SAMD9/9L adaptations probably resulted from strong viral selective pressures, including by lentiviruses, and could contribute to lentiviral resistance in bonobos. Evolutionary characterization of Avs9 and SAMD9/9L provides a deeper understanding of how the immune system adapts to fight viruses over billions of years of evolution. A search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Legrand, Alexandre et al., Etienne, Lucie
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 抗病毒SAMD9/9L跨界演化特征揭示古老趋同演化与谱系特异性适应
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 人类SAMD9和SAMD9L是编码先天免疫蛋白的重复基因，这些蛋白能限制痘病毒和慢病毒，例如人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）。这些基因的突变与遗传疾病和癌症有关。本研究结合结构相似性搜索、系统发育学和群体基因组学，以及SAMD9/9L功能的实验分析，解析了这些免疫蛋白从原核生物到灵长类动物的演化和功能动态。我们发现，在抗噬菌体防御系统Avs中存在SAMD9/9L的结构类似物，这源于趋同演化。此外，预测的核酸酶位点在细菌类似物中是保守的，并且对细胞死亡至关重要，这表明其在不同生命界域的防御中具有基础性作用。尽管存在这种共享免疫性，我们仍在哺乳动物中发现了演化军备竞赛的基因组特征，并伴有显著的基因拷贝数变异。我们进一步揭示，倭黑猩猩中SAMD9的缺失对应着近期发生的基因丢失，该基因丢失仍在群体中分离。最后，我们发现黑猩猩和倭黑猩猩的SAMD9L与人类直系同源物相比，具有增强的抗HIV-1功能。这些SAMD9/9L的适应性可能源于强大的病毒选择压力，包括慢病毒，并可能有助于倭黑猩猩对慢病毒的抵抗力。Avs9和SAMD9/9L的演化特征分析为我们深入理解免疫系统如何在数十亿年的演化中适应并对抗病毒提供了依据。对人类抗病毒基因SAMD9/9L类似物的搜索，揭示了该基因家族在细菌界和动物界中的趋同演化，其物种特异性和近期基因组特征表明了与病毒演化军备竞赛所导致的适应性。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: A phage-encoded anti-CRISPR protein co-opts host enolase to prevent type III CRISPR immunity
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Microbiology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41564-025-02178-2Streptococcus thermophilus phages circumvent host CRISPR defences via AcrIIIA2, which complexes with enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to block phage RNA binding.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: CRISPR (Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short Palindromic Repeats) systems provide powerful adaptive immunity against phage infection. In response, phages use anti-CRISPR (Acr) proteins to evade CRISPR immunity. The few type III Acrs identified so far show conditional effectiveness in countering type III immunity or rely on unknown or poorly understood inhibitory mechanisms. Here we report the discovery of AcrIIIA2, a type III-A Acr encoded by Streptococcus thermophilus phages. Biochemical and structural analyses reveal that phage AcrIIIA2 co-opts host enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to form a ternary complex with the S. thermophilus type III-A (Csm) CRISPR ribonucleoprotein complex, obstructing its immune responses. The enolase-chaperoned AcrIIIA2 blocks the initial step of phage RNA binding, thereby preventing downstream type III anti-phage immune responses. Enolase participates in the anti-immune response by serving as an essential structural scaffold, stabilizing Acr–CRISPR interactions. These findings uncover a new anti-defence strategy that exploits a well-conserved host factor to block CRISPR immunity. Streptococcus thermophilus phages circumvent host CRISPR defences via AcrIIIA2, which complexes with enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to block phage RNA binding.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Johnson, Katie A. et al., Terns, Michael P.
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 噬菌体编码的抗CRISPR蛋白劫持宿主烯醇化酶以抑制III型CRISPR免疫
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: CRISPR（规律间隔成簇短回文重复序列）系统为抵御噬菌体感染提供了强大的适应性免疫。作为回应，噬菌体利用抗CRISPR（Acr）蛋白来逃避CRISPR免疫。迄今为止发现的少数III型Acr蛋白在对抗III型免疫方面表现出条件性有效性，或者依赖于未知或知之甚少的抑制机制。本研究报道了AcrIIIA2的发现，这是一种由嗜热链球菌噬菌体编码的III-A型Acr蛋白。生化和结构分析表明，噬菌体AcrIIIA2劫持宿主烯醇化酶（一种高度丰富的糖酵解酶），与嗜热链球菌III-A型（Csm）CRISPR核糖核蛋白复合体形成三元复合体，从而阻碍其免疫反应。由烯醇化酶伴护的AcrIIIA2阻断了噬菌体RNA结合的初始步骤，从而阻止了下游的III型抗噬菌体免疫反应。烯醇化酶通过充当必需的结构支架来参与抗免疫反应，稳定Acr-CRISPR相互作用。这些发现揭示了一种新的抗防御策略，该策略利用一种高度保守的宿主因子来阻断CRISPR免疫。嗜热链球菌噬菌体通过AcrIIIA2规避宿主CRISPR防御，AcrIIIA2与烯醇化酶（一种高度丰富的糖酵解酶）形成复合体，从而阻断噬菌体RNA结合。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Reprogramming of H3K36me2 guides lineage-specific post-implantation de novo DNA methylation
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Cell Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41556-025-01805-8Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: In mammals, DNA methylation is re-established after implantation following post-fertilization global erasure. Yet, the underlying mechanism remains elusive. Here we investigate H3K36me2 reprogramming in mouse early development and its role in post-implantation DNA methylation re-establishment. In oocytes, H3K36me2 accumulates in gene bodies upon transcription silencing and partially persists to the eight-cell stage. De novo H3K36me2 occurs at enhancers after zygotic genome activation, before spreading genome-wide after implantation, except on the inactive X chromosome. Mutation of the H3K36me2 methyltransferase NSD1 compromises global DNA methylation after implantation preferentially in extra-embryonic lineages and that at methylation-prone promoters, including those of germline-specific genes. However, DNA methylation establishment partially bypasses H3K36me2 through upregulated DNMT3B, a ‘leaky’ H3K36me2/3 reader. This contrasts with DNMT3A, which strictly requires H3K36me2/3 for DNA methylation through its PWWP domain. Finally, DNA methylation valleys escape de novo DNA methylation via PRC1/H2AK119ub1-mediated H3K36me2 exclusion. Thus, H3K36me2 reprogramming regulates lineage- and locus-specific post-implantation DNA methylation establishment. Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Lu, Xukun et al., Xie, Wei
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: H3K36me2重编程引导谱系特异性着床后从头DNA甲基化
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 在哺乳动物中，DNA甲基化在受精后经历全局擦除，并在着床后重新建立。然而，其潜在机制仍不清楚。本研究探讨了小鼠早期发育过程中H3K36me2的重编程及其在着床后DNA甲基化重建中的作用。在卵母细胞中，H3K36me2在转录沉默后于基因体中积累，并部分持续到八细胞阶段。受精卵基因组激活后，从头H3K36me2在增强子处发生，随后在着床后全基因组扩散，但失活的X染色体除外。H3K36me2甲基转移酶NSD1的突变损害了着床后全局DNA甲基化，尤其是在胚外谱系和易于甲基化的启动子（包括生殖系特异性基因的启动子）处。然而，DNA甲基化的建立通过上调的DNMT3B（一种“泄漏的”H3K36me2/3读取器）部分绕过了H3K36me2。这与DNMT3A形成对比，DNMT3A通过其PWWP结构域严格需要H3K36me2/3才能进行DNA甲基化。最后，DNA甲基化谷通过PRC1/H2AK119ub1介导的H3K36me2排斥作用逃避了从头DNA甲基化。因此，H3K36me2重编程调控着谱系和位点特异性的着床后DNA甲基化建立。Lu, Wang等人描绘了卵母细胞到胚胎转变、着床前和着床后早期发育过程中H3K36me2的图谱，并报告了H3K36me2在着床后胚胎中重建谱系特异性DNA甲基化中的作用。

Development.title_cn: 哺乳动物剂量补偿过程中X连锁转座元件的动态剂量变化
Development.abstract_cn: 在哺乳动物中，X连锁剂量补偿涉及X染色体失活以平衡雄性和雌性之间的X染色体剂量，以及剩余X染色体的超激活（Xa超激活）以在两性中实现X-常染色体平衡。对这两个过程的研究主要集中在编码基因上，而忽略了转座元件，后者占X染色体的50%并具有多种表观遗传功能。在此，我们开发了一种针对重复元件的新型生物信息学流程，该流程具有等位基因区分能力。随后，我们将该流程应用于我们最近对单个胚胎进行的So-Smart-Seq分析，以全面探究X连锁转座元件是否受到X染色体失活或Xa超激活的影响。我们观察到，在亲本驱动的“印记”X染色体失活与合子驱动的“随机”X染色体失活中，重复序列的沉默存在显著差异。染色体定位、遗传背景和进化年龄影响其沉默。相比之下，转座元件不经历Xa超激活。本文讨论了其进化和功能意义。X染色体剂量补偿涉及失活和超激活，但转座元件的作用尚不明确。本文作者表明，X连锁重复序列在失活过程中表现出差异性沉默，但不经历超激活。

Development.title: Heterogeneous plasticity of amygdala interneurons in associative learning and extinction
Development.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-66122-yIn this study, the authors uncover how diverse inhibitory interneurons in the amygdala flexibly contribute to fear and safety learning, revealing a key role for inhibition in emotional memory and adaptive circuit plasticity.
Development.abstract: Neural circuits undergo experience-dependent plasticity to form long-lasting memories, but how inhibitory interneurons contribute to this process remains poorly understood. Using miniature microscope calcium imaging, we monitored the activity of large amygdala interneuron populations in freely moving mice during fear learning and extinction. Here we show that interneurons exhibit complex and heterogeneous plasticity at both single-cell and ensemble levels across memory acquisition, expression, and extinction. Analysis of molecular interneuron subpopulations revealed that disinhibitory vasoactive intestinal peptide (VIP)-expressing cells are predominantly activated by salient external stimuli, whereas the activity of projection neuron targeting somatostatin (SST) interneurons additionally aligns with internal behavioural states. Although responses within each interneuron subtype are non-uniform, molecular identity biases their functional role, producing weighted circuit outputs that can flexibly regulate excitatory projection neuron activity and plasticity. These findings demonstrate that inhibitory interneurons actively shape the encoding and stability of emotional memories, underscoring their importance in adaptive learning. In this study, the authors uncover how diverse inhibitory interneurons in the amygdala flexibly contribute to fear and safety learning, revealing a key role for inhibition in emotional memory and adaptive circuit plasticity.
Development.authors_short: Favila, Natalia et al., Krabbe, Sabine
Development.title_cn: 杏仁核中间神经元在联想学习和消退中的异质性可塑性
Development.abstract_cn: 神经回路经历经验依赖性可塑性以形成持久记忆，但抑制性中间神经元如何参与这一过程仍知之甚少。本研究利用微型显微镜钙成像技术，在自由活动小鼠的恐惧学习和消退过程中，监测了大量杏仁核中间神经元群体的活动。我们发现，中间神经元在记忆的获取、表达和消退过程中，在单细胞和群体层面均表现出复杂且异质性的可塑性。对分子中间神经元亚群的分析揭示，去抑制性血管活性肠肽（VIP）表达细胞主要被显著的外部刺激激活，而靶向投射神经元的生长抑素（SST）中间神经元的活动则额外与内部行为状态相关联。尽管每个中间神经元亚型内部的反应并非均一，但分子特性偏向了它们的功能角色，产生了能够灵活调节兴奋性投射神经元活动和可塑性的加权回路输出。这些发现表明，抑制性中间神经元积极塑造情绪记忆的编码和稳定性，强调了它们在适应性学习中的重要性。本研究揭示了杏仁核中多样化的抑制性中间神经元如何灵活地促进恐惧和安全学习，从而揭示了抑制作用在情绪记忆和适应性回路可塑性中的关键作用。

Development.title: Cellular and molecular mechanisms of seahorse male pregnancy
Development.summary: Nature Ecology & Evolution, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41559-025-02883-5Seahorses have a unique sex role reversal with male pregnancy involving the brood pouch, an evolutionarily novel organ. This study uses single-cell genomics and in vivo experiments to reveal the cellular basis and molecular mechanism of pouch development and diversity in seahorses.
Development.abstract: Seahorses and their relatives (syngnathids) show a unique sex role reversal. Their male pregnancy is facilitated by an evolutionary novel organ—the brood pouch that functions analogously to the mammalian uterus and placenta despite originating from entirely different tissues. Here we use comparative single-cell multiomics and genomics analyses to investigate the transition from egg laying to pregnancy during syngnathid evolution and compare the convergently evolved life history of placental parental care with that in mammals. In vivo experiments show that a population of epithelial progenitors that possesses pouch-inducing potential and expresses androgen, not female hormones as in other live-bearers, can trigger pouch ontogeny. Two mechanisms ensure functionality of the pouch: recruitment of pseudo-placenta-related cells characterized by expressed orthologous genes also found in mammalian uteri and co-option of specific cells for sticky eggs attached to specialized skin patches of males that express novel seahorse-specific genes such as pastns and syn-lectins. These mechanisms combined drove pouch diversity and complexity in syngnathids. Seahorses have a unique sex role reversal with male pregnancy involving the brood pouch, an evolutionarily novel organ. This study uses single-cell genomics and in vivo experiments to reveal the cellular basis and molecular mechanism of pouch development and diversity in seahorses.
Development.authors_short: Liu, Yali et al., Lin, Qiang
Development.title_cn: 海马雄性妊娠的细胞与分子机制
Development.abstract_cn: 海马及其近亲（海龙科鱼类）展现出独特的性别角色逆转现象。其雄性妊娠由一个进化上新颖的器官——育儿袋——所促成。尽管育儿袋起源于完全不同的组织，但其功能与哺乳动物的子宫和胎盘类似。本研究利用比较单细胞多组学和基因组学分析，探讨了海龙科鱼类进化过程中从产卵到妊娠的转变，并将其趋同进化的胎盘式亲代抚育与哺乳动物进行了比较。体内实验表明，一群具有育儿袋诱导潜能并表达雄激素（而非其他胎生动物中的雌激素）的上皮祖细胞，能够触发育儿袋的发生。两种机制确保了育儿袋的功能性：一是招募与假胎盘相关的细胞，这些细胞的特征是表达在哺乳动物子宫中也发现的直系同源基因；二是协同利用特定细胞，使粘性卵附着在雄性特化的皮肤斑块上，这些斑块表达海马特有的新基因，如pastns和syn-lectins。这些机制共同推动了海龙科鱼类育儿袋的多样性和复杂性。本研究通过单细胞基因组学和体内实验，揭示了海马育儿袋发育和多样性的细胞基础和分子机制。

Development.title: Reprogramming of H3K36me2 guides lineage-specific post-implantation de novo DNA methylation
Development.summary: Nature Cell Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41556-025-01805-8Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.
Development.abstract: In mammals, DNA methylation is re-established after implantation following post-fertilization global erasure. Yet, the underlying mechanism remains elusive. Here we investigate H3K36me2 reprogramming in mouse early development and its role in post-implantation DNA methylation re-establishment. In oocytes, H3K36me2 accumulates in gene bodies upon transcription silencing and partially persists to the eight-cell stage. De novo H3K36me2 occurs at enhancers after zygotic genome activation, before spreading genome-wide after implantation, except on the inactive X chromosome. Mutation of the H3K36me2 methyltransferase NSD1 compromises global DNA methylation after implantation preferentially in extra-embryonic lineages and that at methylation-prone promoters, including those of germline-specific genes. However, DNA methylation establishment partially bypasses H3K36me2 through upregulated DNMT3B, a ‘leaky’ H3K36me2/3 reader. This contrasts with DNMT3A, which strictly requires H3K36me2/3 for DNA methylation through its PWWP domain. Finally, DNA methylation valleys escape de novo DNA methylation via PRC1/H2AK119ub1-mediated H3K36me2 exclusion. Thus, H3K36me2 reprogramming regulates lineage- and locus-specific post-implantation DNA methylation establishment. Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.
Development.authors_short: Lu, Xukun et al., Xie, Wei
Development.title_cn: H3K36me2重编程引导谱系特异性着床后从头DNA甲基化
Development.abstract_cn: 在哺乳动物中，DNA甲基化在受精后经历全局擦除，并在着床后重新建立。然而，其潜在机制仍不清楚。本研究探讨了小鼠早期发育过程中H3K36me2的重编程及其在着床后DNA甲基化重建中的作用。在卵母细胞中，H3K36me2在转录沉默后于基因体中积累，并部分持续到八细胞阶段。受精卵基因组激活后，从头H3K36me2在增强子处发生，随后在着床后全基因组扩散，但失活的X染色体除外。H3K36me2甲基转移酶NSD1的突变损害了着床后全局DNA甲基化，尤其是在胚外谱系和易于甲基化的启动子（包括生殖系特异性基因的启动子）处。然而，DNA甲基化的建立通过上调的DNMT3B（一种“泄漏的”H3K36me2/3读取器）部分绕过了H3K36me2。这与DNMT3A形成对比，DNMT3A通过其PWWP结构域严格需要H3K36me2/3才能进行DNA甲基化。最后，DNA甲基化谷通过PRC1/H2AK119ub1介导的H3K36me2排斥作用逃避了从头DNA甲基化。因此，H3K36me2重编程调控着谱系和位点特异性的着床后DNA甲基化建立。Lu, Wang等人描绘了卵母细胞到胚胎转变、着床前和着床后早期发育过程中H3K36me2的图谱，并报告了H3K36me2在着床后胚胎中重建谱系特异性DNA甲基化中的作用。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Multimodal learning enables chat-based exploration of single-cell data
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02857-9CellWhisperer uses multimodal learning of transcriptomes and text to answer questions about single-cell RNA-sequencing data.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: Single-cell sequencing characterizes biological samples at unprecedented scale and detail, but data interpretation remains challenging. Here, we present CellWhisperer, an artificial intelligence (AI) model and software tool for chat-based interrogation of gene expression. We establish a multimodal embedding of transcriptomes and their textual annotations, using contrastive learning on 1 million RNA sequencing profiles with AI-curated descriptions. This embedding informs a large language model that answers user-provided questions about cells and genes in natural-language chats. We benchmark CellWhisperer’s performance for zero-shot prediction of cell types and other biological annotations and demonstrate its use for biological discovery in a meta-analysis of human embryonic development. We integrate a CellWhisperer chat box with the CELLxGENE browser, allowing users to interactively explore gene expression through a combined graphical and chat interface. In summary, CellWhisperer leverages large community-scale data repositories to connect transcriptomes and text, thereby enabling interactive exploration of single-cell RNA-sequencing data with natural-language chats. CellWhisperer uses multimodal learning of transcriptomes and text to answer questions about single-cell RNA-sequencing data.

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: 多模态学习赋能单细胞数据的对话式探索
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 单细胞测序以空前的规模和细节对生物样本进行表征，但数据解读仍具挑战。在此，我们提出CellWhisperer，这是一种人工智能（AI）模型和软件工具，旨在实现基因表达的对话式查询。我们通过对100万个RNA测序图谱及其AI策展的描述进行对比学习，建立了转录组及其文本注释的多模态嵌入。该嵌入为大型语言模型提供了基础，使其能够以自然语言对话的形式回答用户关于细胞和基因的问题。我们对CellWhisperer在细胞类型和其他生物学注释的零样本预测性能进行了基准评估，并在一项人类胚胎发育的荟萃分析中，展示了其在生物学发现中的应用。我们将CellWhisperer聊天框与CELLxGENE浏览器集成，使用户能够通过图形与对话相结合的界面交互式探索基因表达。总之，CellWhisperer利用大型社区规模的数据存储库连接转录组数据与文本信息，从而通过自然语言对话实现单细胞RNA测序数据的交互式探索。CellWhisperer通过转录组和文本的多模态学习，解答关于单细胞RNA测序数据的问题。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Dynamic dosage changes in X-linked transposable elements during mammalian dosage compensation
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64865-2X-chromosome dosage compensation involves inactivation and hyperactivation, but the role of transposable elements is unclear. Here, the authors show that X-linked repeats are differentially silenced during inactivation but do not undergo hyperactivation.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: In mammals, X-linked dosage compensation involves X-chromosome inactivation to balance X chromosome dosage between males and females, and hyperactivation of the remaining X-chromosome (Xa-hyperactivation) to achieve X-autosome balance in both sexes. Studies of both processes have largely focused on coding genes and have not accounted for transposable elements which comprise 50% of the X-chromosome with numerous epigenetic functions. Here we develop a new bioinformatic pipeline tailored to repetitive elements with capability for allelic discrimination. We then apply the pipeline to our recent So-Smart-Seq analysis of single embryos to comprehensively interrogate whether X-linked transposable elements are subject to either X-chromosome inactivation or Xa-hyperactivation. We observe significant differences in repeat silencing in parentally driven “imprinted” versus zygotically driven “random” X-chromosome inactivation. Chromosomal positioning, genetic background and evolutionary age impact their silencing. In contrast, transposable elements do not undergo Xa-hyperactivation. Evolutionary and functional implications are discussed. X-chromosome dosage compensation involves inactivation and hyperactivation, but the role of transposable elements is unclear. Here, the authors show that X-linked repeats are differentially silenced during inactivation but do not undergo hyperactivation.

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Single-cell analysis reveals cell death as driver of NLRP3-mediated secretion of IL-1β in human monocytes
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature Immunology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41590-025-02319-zLamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: Interleukin-1β (IL-1β) is a key proinflammatory cytokine with critical roles in infections and inflammatory diseases, yet the mechanisms regulating its release from human monocytes remain unclear. Here we used a suite of single-cell approaches, including integrated live-cell imaging of secretion and cell fate, flow cytometry and high-content imaging, to investigate IL-1β secretion dynamics in lipopolysaccharide-stimulated primary human peripheral blood CD14+ monocytes. We found marked heterogeneity: a large fraction of cells remained viable and contributed negligibly to IL-1β secretion, challenging established models. Instead, a small subset (5–10%) undergoing canonical NLRP3 inflammasome activation and GSDMD-dependent pyroptosis produced the majority of secreted IL-1β, with a smaller contribution from apoptotic cells transitioning to secondary necrosis. Single-cell profiling of CD14+ monocytes from patients with cryopyrin-associated periodic syndrome confirmed lytic cell death as the driver of pathological IL-1β release. These findings redefine IL-1β as a damage-associated molecular pattern, secreted predominantly by dying monocytes. Lamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: 单细胞分析揭示细胞死亡是人单核细胞中NLRP3介导的IL-1β分泌的驱动因素
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 白细胞介素-1β (IL-1β) 是一种关键的促炎细胞因子，在感染和炎症性疾病中发挥着重要作用，然而，其从人单核细胞中释放的调控机制仍不清楚。本研究中，我们采用了一系列单细胞方法，包括分泌和细胞命运的整合活细胞成像、流式细胞术和高内涵成像，以研究脂多糖刺激的原代人外周血CD14+单核细胞中IL-1β的分泌动态。我们发现显著的异质性：大部分细胞保持活力，对IL-1β分泌的贡献微乎其微，这挑战了既有的模型。相反，一小部分（5-10%）经历经典NLRP3炎性体激活和GSDMD依赖性细胞焦亡的细胞产生了大部分分泌的IL-1β，而从凋亡细胞向继发性坏死转变的细胞贡献较小。对冷吡啉相关周期综合征患者CD14+单核细胞的单细胞分析证实，裂解性细胞死亡是病理性IL-1β释放的驱动因素。这些发现将IL-1β重新定义为一种损伤相关分子模式，主要由垂死的单核细胞分泌。Lamkanfi、Shirasaki、Izawa及其同事的研究表明，在脂多糖刺激或携带NLRP3激活突变的人单核细胞中，IL-1β的释放主要局限于经历裂解性细胞死亡的细胞。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Universal consensus 3D segmentation of cells from 2D segmented stacks
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02887-wu-Segment3D is a universal framework that translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data. It performs well across diverse datasets, including cells with complex morphologies.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: Cell segmentation is the foundation of a wide range of microscopy-based biological studies. Deep learning has revolutionized two-dimensional (2D) cell segmentation, enabling generalized solutions across cell types and imaging modalities. Cancer.title: Wild-type KRAS activation drives evasion of interferon-mediated immunity and resistance to immunotherapy in hepatocellular carcinoma
Cancer.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64860-7Increasing evidence suggests that activation of oncogenic pathways contributes to an unfavorable tumor microenvironment. Here, the authors show that wild-type KRAS plays a key role in immune evasion in hepatocellular carcinoma by impairing interferon-mediated immunity and promoting resistance to immunotherapy via the EGFR/MEK/ERK pathway.
Cancer.abstract: Increasing evidence indicates that activation of oncogenic pathways contributes to an unfavourable tumour immune microenvironment (TIME), ultimately resulting in resistance to immunotherapy. Here, we aim to identify a critical oncogenic pathway involved in an antigen-expressing c-MYC-lucOSOE/Tp53KO hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) mouse model that simulates immune response against tumour-associated antigens. Using data-independent acquisition proteomics, we reveal the role of wild-type KRAS in immune escaped mouse HCC tumours, with EGF concurrently activating EGFR/MEK/ERK signalling. Single cell RNA sequencing data analysis reveals that KRAS signalling intrinsically inhibits interferon-mediated MHC-I expression and extrinsically impairs CD8+ T cell activity due to the suppression of CXCL9 through the EGFR/MEK/ERK pathway. We observe KRAS activation in HCC patients who received immune checkpoint inhibitor (ICI) treatments, where it correlates with poor clinical outcomes. Notably, combination therapy with SOS1 inhibitor MRTX0902, Trametinib, and anti-PD-1 antibody effectively increased intratumoural CD8+ T cell infiltration and improved survival. Our study thus reveals that targeting wild-type KRAS signalling in combination with ICIs may serve as an effective treatment strategy for advanced HCC patients. Increasing evidence suggests that activation of oncogenic pathways contributes to an unfavorable tumor microenvironment. Here, the authors show that wild-type KRAS plays a key role in immune evasion in hepatocellular carcinoma by impairing interferon-mediated immunity and promoting resistance to immunotherapy via the EGFR/MEK/ERK pathway.

Cancer.abstract_cn: 越来越多的证据表明，致癌通路激活导致不利的肿瘤免疫微环境（TIME），最终引发对免疫治疗的抵抗。本研究旨在识别一个在表达抗原的c-MYC-lucOSOE/Tp53KO肝细胞癌（HCC）小鼠模型中涉及的关键致癌通路，该模型模拟了针对肿瘤相关抗原的免疫反应。利用数据非依赖性采集蛋白质组学，我们揭示了野生型KRAS在免疫逃逸的小鼠HCC肿瘤中的作用，其中表皮生长因子（EGF）同时激活EGFR/MEK/ERK信号通路。单细胞RNA测序数据分析显示，KRAS信号通路通过EGFR/MEK/ERK通路抑制CXCL9，从而内在性地抑制干扰素介导的MHC-I表达，并外在性地损害CD8+ T细胞活性。我们在接受免疫检查点抑制剂（ICI）治疗的HCC患者中观察到KRAS激活，且其与不良临床预后相关。值得注意的是，SOS1抑制剂MRTX0902、曲美替尼（Trametinib）和抗PD-1抗体的联合治疗有效增加了肿瘤内CD8+ T细胞浸润并改善了生存。因此，我们的研究揭示，靶向野生型KRAS信号通路与ICI联合可能成为晚期HCC患者的有效治疗策略。越来越多的证据表明，致癌通路激活导致不利的肿瘤微环境。在此，作者们表明野生型KRAS通过损害干扰素介导的免疫并经由EGFR/MEK/ERK通路促进对免疫治疗的抵抗，从而在肝细胞癌的免疫逃逸中发挥关键作用。

Immunology.title: Evolutionary characterization of antiviral SAMD9/9L across kingdoms supports ancient convergence and lineage-specific adaptations
Immunology.summary: Nature Ecology & Evolution, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41559-025-02845-xA search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.
Immunology.abstract: Human SAMD9 and SAMD9L are duplicated genes that encode innate immune proteins restricting poxviruses and lentiviruses, such as human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). Mutations in these genes are implicated in genetic diseases and cancer. Here we combined structural similarity searches, phylogenetics and population genomics with experimental assays of SAMD9/9L functions to resolve the evolutionary and functional dynamics of these immune proteins, spanning from prokaryotes to primates. We discovered structural analogues of SAMD9/9L in the antibacteriophage defence system, Avs, resulting from convergent evolution. Further, the predicted nuclease site was conserved in bacterial analogues and was essential for cell death, suggesting a fundamental role in defence across different life kingdoms. Despite this shared immunity, we identified genomic signatures of evolutionary arms races in mammals, with remarkable gene copy number variations. We further unveiled that the absence of SAMD9 in bonobos corresponds to a recent gene loss still segregating in the population. Finally, we found that chimpanzee and bonobo SAMD9Ls have enhanced anti-HIV-1 functions compared with the human orthologue. These SAMD9/9L adaptations probably resulted from strong viral selective pressures, including by lentiviruses, and could contribute to lentiviral resistance in bonobos. Evolutionary characterization of Avs9 and SAMD9/9L provides a deeper understanding of how the immune system adapts to fight viruses over billions of years of evolution. A search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.

Immunology.title_cn: 抗病毒SAMD9/9L跨界演化特征揭示古老趋同演化与谱系特异性适应
Immunology.abstract_cn: 人类SAMD9和SAMD9L是编码先天免疫蛋白的重复基因，这些蛋白能限制痘病毒和慢病毒，例如人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV）。这些基因的突变与遗传疾病和癌症有关。本研究结合结构相似性搜索、系统发育学和群体基因组学，以及SAMD9/9L功能的实验分析，解析了这些免疫蛋白从原核生物到灵长类动物的演化和功能动态。我们发现，在抗噬菌体防御系统Avs中存在SAMD9/9L的结构类似物，这源于趋同演化。此外，预测的核酸酶位点在细菌类似物中是保守的，并且对细胞死亡至关重要，这表明其在不同生命界域的防御中具有基础性作用。尽管存在这种共享免疫性，我们仍在哺乳动物中发现了演化军备竞赛的基因组特征，并伴有显著的基因拷贝数变异。我们进一步揭示，倭黑猩猩中SAMD9的缺失对应着近期发生的基因丢失，该基因丢失仍在群体中分离。最后，我们发现黑猩猩和倭黑猩猩的SAMD9L与人类直系同源物相比，具有增强的抗HIV-1功能。这些SAMD9/9L的适应性可能源于强大的病毒选择压力，包括慢病毒，并可能有助于倭黑猩猩对慢病毒的抵抗力。Avs9和SAMD9/9L的演化特征分析为我们深入理解免疫系统如何在数十亿年的演化中适应并对抗病毒提供了依据。对人类抗病毒基因SAMD9/9L类似物的搜索，揭示了该基因家族在细菌界和动物界中的趋同演化，其物种特异性和近期基因组特征表明了与病毒演化军备竞赛所导致的适应性。

Immunology.title: Single-cell analysis reveals cell death as driver of NLRP3-mediated secretion of IL-1β in human monocytes
Immunology.summary: Nature Immunology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41590-025-02319-zLamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.
Immunology.abstract: Interleukin-1β (IL-1β) is a key proinflammatory cytokine with critical roles in infections and inflammatory diseases, yet the mechanisms regulating its release from human monocytes remain unclear. Here we used a suite of single-cell approaches, including integrated live-cell imaging of secretion and cell fate, flow cytometry and high-content imaging, to investigate IL-1β secretion dynamics in lipopolysaccharide-stimulated primary human peripheral blood CD14+ monocytes. We found marked heterogeneity: a large fraction of cells remained viable and contributed negligibly to IL-1β secretion, challenging established models. Instead, a small subset (5–10%) undergoing canonical NLRP3 inflammasome activation and GSDMD-dependent pyroptosis produced the majority of secreted IL-1β, with a smaller contribution from apoptotic cells transitioning to secondary necrosis. Single-cell profiling of CD14+ monocytes from patients with cryopyrin-associated periodic syndrome confirmed lytic cell death as the driver of pathological IL-1β release. These findings redefine IL-1β as a damage-associated molecular pattern, secreted predominantly by dying monocytes. Lamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.

Immunology.title_cn: 单细胞分析揭示细胞死亡是人单核细胞中NLRP3介导的IL-1β分泌的驱动因素
Immunology.abstract_cn: 白细胞介素-1β (IL-1β) 是一种关键的促炎细胞因子，在感染和炎症性疾病中发挥着重要作用，然而，其从人单核细胞中释放的调控机制仍不清楚。本研究中，我们采用了一系列单细胞方法，包括分泌和细胞命运的整合活细胞成像、流式细胞术和高内涵成像，以研究脂多糖刺激的原代人外周血CD14+单核细胞中IL-1β的分泌动态。我们发现显著的异质性：大部分细胞保持活力，对IL-1β分泌的贡献微乎其微，这挑战了既有的模型。相反，一小部分（5-10%）经历经典NLRP3炎性体激活和GSDMD依赖性细胞焦亡的细胞产生了大部分分泌的IL-1β，而从凋亡细胞向继发性坏死转变的细胞贡献较小。对冷吡啉相关周期综合征患者CD14+单核细胞的单细胞分析证实，裂解性细胞死亡是病理性IL-1β释放的驱动因素。这些发现将IL-1β重新定义为一种损伤相关分子模式，主要由垂死的单核细胞分泌。Lamkanfi、Shirasaki、Izawa及其同事的研究表明，在脂多糖刺激或携带NLRP3激活突变的人单核细胞中，IL-1β的释放主要局限于经历裂解性细胞死亡的细胞。

Immunology.title: A phage-encoded anti-CRISPR protein co-opts host enolase to prevent type III CRISPR immunity
Immunology.summary: Nature Microbiology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41564-025-02178-2Streptococcus thermophilus phages circumvent host CRISPR defences via AcrIIIA2, which complexes with enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to block phage RNA binding.
Immunology.abstract: CRISPR (Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short Palindromic Repeats) systems provide powerful adaptive immunity against phage infection. In response, phages use anti-CRISPR (Acr) proteins to evade CRISPR immunity. The few type III Acrs identified so far show conditional effectiveness in countering type III immunity or rely on unknown or poorly understood inhibitory mechanisms. Here we report the discovery of AcrIIIA2, a type III-A Acr encoded by Streptococcus thermophilus phages. Biochemical and structural analyses reveal that phage AcrIIIA2 co-opts host enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to form a ternary complex with the S. thermophilus type III-A (Csm) CRISPR ribonucleoprotein complex, obstructing its immune responses. The enolase-chaperoned AcrIIIA2 blocks the initial step of phage RNA binding, thereby preventing downstream type III anti-phage immune responses. Enolase participates in the anti-immune response by serving as an essential structural scaffold, stabilizing Acr–CRISPR interactions. These findings uncover a new anti-defence strategy that exploits a well-conserved host factor to block CRISPR immunity. Streptococcus thermophilus phages circumvent host CRISPR defences via AcrIIIA2, which complexes with enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to block phage RNA binding.

Immunology.title_cn: 噬菌体编码的抗CRISPR蛋白劫持宿主烯醇化酶以抑制III型CRISPR免疫
Immunology.abstract_cn: CRISPR（规律间隔成簇短回文重复序列）系统为抵御噬菌体感染提供了强大的适应性免疫。作为回应，噬菌体利用抗CRISPR（Acr）蛋白来逃避CRISPR免疫。迄今为止发现的少数III型Acr蛋白在对抗III型免疫方面表现出条件性有效性，或者依赖于未知或知之甚少的抑制机制。本研究报道了AcrIIIA2的发现，这是一种由嗜热链球菌噬菌体编码的III-A型Acr蛋白。生化和结构分析表明，噬菌体AcrIIIA2劫持宿主烯醇化酶（一种高度丰富的糖酵解酶），与嗜热链球菌III-A型（Csm）CRISPR核糖核蛋白复合体形成三元复合体，从而阻碍其免疫反应。由烯醇化酶伴护的AcrIIIA2阻断了噬菌体RNA结合的初始步骤，从而阻止了下游的III型抗噬菌体免疫反应。烯醇化酶通过充当必需的结构支架来参与抗免疫反应，稳定Acr-CRISPR相互作用。这些发现揭示了一种新的抗防御策略，该策略利用一种高度保守的宿主因子来阻断CRISPR免疫。嗜热链球菌噬菌体通过AcrIIIA2规避宿主CRISPR防御，AcrIIIA2与烯醇化酶（一种高度丰富的糖酵解酶）形成复合体，从而阻断噬菌体RNA结合。

Drug Discovery.abstract_cn: 越来越多的证据表明，致癌通路激活导致不利的肿瘤免疫微环境（TIME），最终引发对免疫治疗的抵抗。本研究旨在识别一个在表达抗原的c-MYC-lucOSOE/Tp53KO肝细胞癌（HCC）小鼠模型中涉及的关键致癌通路，该模型模拟了针对肿瘤相关抗原的免疫反应。利用数据非依赖性采集蛋白质组学，我们揭示了野生型KRAS在免疫逃逸的小鼠HCC肿瘤中的作用，其中表皮生长因子（EGF）同时激活EGFR/MEK/ERK信号通路。单细胞RNA测序数据分析显示，KRAS信号通路通过EGFR/MEK/ERK通路抑制CXCL9，从而内在性地抑制干扰素介导的MHC-I表达，并外在性地损害CD8+ T细胞活性。我们在接受免疫检查点抑制剂（ICI）治疗的HCC患者中观察到KRAS激活，且其与不良临床预后相关。值得注意的是，SOS1抑制剂MRTX0902、曲美替尼（Trametinib）和抗PD-1抗体的联合治疗有效增加了肿瘤内CD8+ T细胞浸润并改善了生存。因此，我们的研究揭示，靶向野生型KRAS信号通路与ICI联合可能成为晚期HCC患者的有效治疗策略。越来越多的证据表明，致癌通路激活导致不利的肿瘤微环境。在此，作者们表明野生型KRAS通过损害干扰素介导的免疫并经由EGFR/MEK/ERK通路促进对免疫治疗的抵抗，从而在肝细胞癌的免疫逃逸中发挥关键作用。

Bioengineering.title: A parts list of promoters and gRNA scaffolds for mammalian genome engineering and molecular recording
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02896-2Prime editing in mammalian cells benefits from a comprehensive list of genetic parts.
Bioengineering.abstract: A standardized ‘parts list’ of sequences for genetic engineering of microbes has been indispensable to progress in synthetic biology, but few analogous parts exist for mammalian systems. Here we design libraries of extant, ancestral, mutagenized or miniaturized variants of polymerase III promoters and guide RNA (gRNA) scaffolds and quantify their abilities to mediate precise edits to the mammalian genome through multiplex prime editing. We identify thousands of parts for reproducible editing in human and mouse cell lines, including hundreds with greater activity than commonly used sequences. Saturation mutagenesis screens identify tolerated sequence variants that further enhance sequence diversity. In an application to molecular recording, we design a ‘ten key’ array that, in mammalian cells, achieves balanced activity of pegRNAs as predicted by the activity of the component parts. The data reported here will aid the design of synthetic loci encoding arrays of gRNAs exhibiting predictable, differentiated levels of activity for applications in multiplexed perturbation, biological recorders and complex genetic circuits. Prime editing in mammalian cells benefits from a comprehensive list of genetic parts.

Bioengineering.title_cn: 用于哺乳动物基因组工程与分子记录的启动子和gRNA骨架元件库
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 微生物基因工程的标准化“元件清单”对合成生物学的发展至关重要，但哺乳动物系统中缺乏类似的元件。本研究设计了聚合酶III启动子和引导RNA (gRNA) 骨架的现有、祖先、诱变或微型化变体库，并量化了它们通过多重先导编辑介导哺乳动物基因组精确编辑的能力。我们鉴定了数千个可在人和小鼠细胞系中实现可重复编辑的元件，其中数百个元件的活性高于常用序列。饱和诱变筛选确定了可耐受的序列变体，这些变体进一步增强了序列多样性。在分子记录的应用中，我们设计了一个“十键”阵列，该阵列在哺乳动物细胞中实现了pegRNA的平衡活性，这与组成元件的活性预测一致。本研究报告的数据将有助于设计合成基因座，这些基因座编码的gRNA阵列在多重扰动、生物记录器和复杂遗传电路等应用中表现出可预测的、差异化的活性水平。哺乳动物细胞中的先导编辑将受益于全面的遗传元件清单。

Bioengineering.title: A software platform for real-time and adaptive neuroscience experiments
Bioengineering.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64856-3An optimal model-experiment integration for testing many complex hypotheses is still lacking. Here authors introduce improv, a modular software platform enabling real-time adaptive neuroscience experiments, orchestrating parallel data collection, modeling, and experimental control. Authors demonstrate various use cases, including online neural analysis and closed-loop optogenetics in zebrafish.
Bioengineering.abstract: Current neuroscience research is often limited to testing predetermined hypotheses and post hoc analysis of already collected data. Adaptive experimental designs, in which modeling drives ongoing data collection and selects experimental manipulations, offer a promising alternative. However, such adaptive paradigms require tight integration between software and hardware under real-time constraints. We introduce improv, a software platform for flexible integration of modeling, data collection, analysis pipelines, and live experimental control. We demonstrate both in silico and in vivo how improv enables efficient experimental designs for discovery and validation across various model organisms and data types. We used improv to orchestrate real-time behavioral analyses, rapid functional typing of neural responses via calcium imaging, optimal visual stimulus selection, and model-driven optogenetic photostimulation of visually responsive neurons in the zebrafish brain. Together, these results demonstrate the power of improv to integrate modeling with data collection and experimental control to achieve next-generation adaptive experiments. An optimal model-experiment integration for testing many complex hypotheses is still lacking. Here authors introduce improv, a modular software platform enabling real-time adaptive neuroscience experiments, orchestrating parallel data collection, modeling, and experimental control. Authors demonstrate various use cases, including online neural analysis and closed-loop optogenetics in zebrafish.
Bioengineering.authors_short: Draelos, Anne et al., Naumann, Eva A.
Bioengineering.title_cn: 一个用于实时和自适应神经科学实验的软件平台
Bioengineering.abstract_cn: 当前的神经科学研究常受限于检验预设假设以及对已收集数据的回顾性分析。自适应实验设计，即通过模型驱动持续数据收集并选择实验操作，提供了一种有前景的替代方案。然而，此类自适应范式要求在实时约束下实现软件与硬件的紧密集成。我们引入了improv，一个能够灵活集成建模、数据收集、分析流程和实时实验控制的软件平台。我们通过计算机模拟（in silico）和体内（in vivo）实验证明了improv如何为各种模式生物和数据类型实现高效的实验设计，以促进科学发现和验证。我们利用improv协调了实时行为分析、通过钙成像对神经反应进行快速功能分型、优化视觉刺激选择，以及在斑马鱼大脑中对视觉响应神经元进行模型驱动的光遗传学光刺激。综上所述，这些结果展示了improv在整合建模与数据收集和实验控制方面的强大能力，从而实现下一代自适应实验。目前，针对许多复杂假设进行测试的最佳模型-实验集成仍有待完善。本文作者在此介绍了improv，一个模块化的软件平台，它能够实现实时自适应神经科学实验，并协调并行的数据收集、建模和实验控制。
